abstract: The Day: Detroit managed to put Umar Farouk Abdulmutallab on trial with little to none of the political wailing that we have been subjected to in New York. Also, what City Room is reading in other newspapers and blogs.
snippet: The Day: Detroit managed to put Umar Farouk Abdulmutallab on trial with little to none of the political wailing that we have been subjected to in New York. Also, what City Room is reading in other newspapers and blogs.
lead_paragraph: Bad enough that Detroit had New York's number in the baseball playoffs. Now it has outclassed us in handling people accused of terrorism. Guess which situation should truly leave New Yorkers hanging their heads.

headline.main: Detroit Beats New York, in Baseball and in Terror Trials
